question: Which city has been declared as the summer capital of Uttarakhand?
explanation:
As per the recent announcement from the Chief Secretary of Uttarakhand, the city of Gairsain in Chamoli district has been declared as the summer capital of Uttarakhand.
The Governor of Uttarakhand Baby Rani Maurya also gave her assent to the decision. Gairsain is located about 270-km from the existing capital of Dehradun.  It is expected that the declaration of summer capital in the region will accelerate development of the hilly areas.
